wikipedia_page.main: William P. Jones  (1870 – 1953) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1889 and 1890, playing 4 matches. He played his first match on 23  February 1889 against England and his last match on 22 March 1890 against Scotland. At club level, he played for Druids.

response: * William P. Jones (1870–1953), Druids F.C. and Wales international footballer
